completionNotes: Completed 2 days ahead of schedule. The final design blends a geometric 'bridge' motif with flowing, interconnected nodes representing human-AI collaboration. The color palette uses the requested tech blues with warm accent colors to emphasize human-centered values. All acceptance criteria met. Included bonus animated logo variant for digital use.

acceptanceMet.notes: Tested at sizes from 16px (favicon) to 2000px (billboard). Remains clear and recognizable.
Provided icon-only, text-only, and combined horizontal/vertical lockups.
Included full-color, monochrome, and reversed (white on dark) versions.
Design rationale document explains how bridge motif represents innovation and connection.
